title: Authors and Citation
text: Mansfield K (2025). tidyzoning: Zoning Code Analysis. R package version 0.1.1, https://kamrynmansfield.github.io/tidyzoning/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tidyzoning: Zoning Code Analysis},   author = {Kamryn Mansfield},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.1},   url = {https://kamrynmansfield.github.io/tidyzoning/}, }

title: Zoning Code Analysis
text: purpose tidyzoning package analyze housing capacity current zoning laws. designed read three types datasets. tidybuilding: json file attributes represent building tidyzoning: geojson file city zoning codes formatted follow Open Zoning Feed Specification tidyparcel: geojson city’s parcel data labeled parcel sides (front, side interior, side exterior, rear) parcel dimensions (lot_width, lot_depth, lot_area) functions tiyzoning allow user find parcels allow specified building based zoning regulations parcel.

title: Zoning Code Analysis
text: can install development version tidyzoning GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("KamrynMansfield/tidyzoning")

title: Zoning Code Analysis
text: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy .
code: library(tidyzoning) unify_tidybuilding("inst/extdata/bldg_12_fam.json") #>   height width depth roof_type parking height_eave stories total_units     type #> 1     60    65    76      flat       8          60       4          12 4_family #>   gross_fl_area total_bedrooms fl_area_first fl_area_top units_0bed units_1bed #> 1         13200             23          4400        4400          0          1 #>   units_2bed units_3bed units_4bed #> 1         11          0          0 summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
title: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
text: `add_setbacks()` returns tidyparcel object new columns describing setback units side.

title: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
code: add_setbacks(   tidyparcel_geo,   tidydistrict,   tidybuilding,   tidyparcel_dims = NULL,   zoning_req = NULL )

title: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
text: tidyparcel_geo tidyparcel object simple features object depicting side parcel label (front, interior side, exterior side, rear, centroid). tidydistrict tidydistrict corresponding tidyparcel. tidydistrict object one row tidyzoning simple features object. tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidyparcel_dims simple features object parcel centroid parcel dimensions zoning_req results get_zoning_req funcion. provided, tidyparcel_dims need provided.

title: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
text: Returns tidyparcel object "setbacks" "units" column added end.

what: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
title: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
text: `check_far()` takes tidybuilding, tidydistrict, tidyparcel see district's zoning code allows tidybuilding based floor area ratio.

title: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
code: check_far(   tidybuilding,   tidydistrict = NULL,   tidyparcel_dims,   zoning_req = NULL )

title: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
text: tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidydistrict tidydistrict corresponding tidyparcel. tidydistrict object one row tidyzoning simple features object. tidyparcel_dims tidyparcel object simple features object depicting side parcel label (front, Interior side, Exterior side, rear, centroid). zoning_req data frame result `get_zoning_req()` function. provided, tidydistrict parccel need provided.

title: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
text: Returns TRUE FALSE stating whether building allowed district based floor area ratio.

what: List district zoning requirement values — get_zoning_req
title: List district zoning requirement values — get_zoning_req
text: many zoning requirements depend proposed building parcel zoning district, `get_zoning_req()` function takes tidybuilding, tidyparcel, tidydistrict outputs data frame listing set zoning requirements three objects create. every value NA, indicate building land use allowed zoning district.

title: List district zoning requirement values — get_zoning_req
code: get_zoning_req(tidybuilding, tidydistrict, tidyparcel_dims)

title: List district zoning requirement values — get_zoning_req
text: tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidydistrict tidydistrict corresponding tidyparcel. tidydistrict object one row tidyzoning simple features object. tidyparcel_dims simple features object parcel centroid parcel dimensions

title: List district zoning requirement values — get_zoning_req
text: Returns data frame value zoning requirement specific building, parcel, zoning district. NA values indicate requirement recorded district. every value NA, indicate building land use allowed zoning district.

title: Add Zoning Requirements — ozfs_add_req
text: `ozfs_add_req()` takes existing geojson file ozfs format, adds simple constraint.

title: Add Zoning Requirements — ozfs_add_req
code: ozfs_add_req(   ozfs_file,   district,   constraint_type = "structure_constraints",   constraint,   units = NULL,   land_uses,   min_or_max,   expression,   overwrite = FALSE )

title: Add Zoning Requirements — ozfs_add_req
text: ozfs_file file path ozfs file needs editing district district needs editing constraint_type constraint type. "structure_constraints", "lot_constraints", "other_constraints" constraint constraint either editing adding. units units constraint. necessary adding new constraint. land_uses land use constraint applies . existing constraint, land_uses match existing land use possibilities. min_or_max Whether expression "min" "max" expression expression used describe new zoning constraint. overwrite TRUE, overwrite existing file.

title: Add Zoning Requirements — ozfs_add_req
text: statement saying file updates added .

title: Run initial check functions — tz_all_checks
text: `tz_initial_checks()` runs initial tidyzoning check functions see certain attributes building allowed parcel.

title: Run initial check functions — tz_all_checks
code: tz_all_checks(   tidybuilding,   tidyzoning,   tidyparcel_dims,   tidyparcel_geo = NULL,   detailed_check = FALSE,   run_check_land_use = TRUE,   run_check_height = TRUE,   run_check_height_eave = TRUE,   run_check_floors = TRUE,   run_check_unit_size = TRUE,   run_check_far = TRUE,   run_check_unit_density = TRUE,   run_check_lot_coverage = TRUE,   run_check_fl_area = TRUE,   run_check_unit_qty = TRUE,   run_check_footprint = FALSE )

title: Run initial check functions — tz_all_checks
text: tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidyzoning tidyzoning simple features object representing zoning districts regulations area. tidyparcel_dims data frame tidyparcel information. zoning_id column tidyparcel_with_dimensions must correspond row numbers tidyzoning object. tidyparcel_geo data frame parcel side geometry detailed_check TRUE, every parcel passes check matter result, take time. FALSE, subsequent checks skipped soon one check reads FALSE run_check_land_use analysis run check_land_use function run_check_height analysis run check_height function run_check_height_eave analysis run check_height_eave function run_check_floors analysis run check_floors function run_check_unit_size analysis run check_unit_size function run_check_far analysis run check_far function run_check_unit_density analysis run check_unit_density function run_check_lot_coverage analysis run check_lot_coverage function run_check_fl_area analysis run check_fl_area function run_check_unit_qty analysis run check_unit_qty function run_check_footprint analysis run check_footprint function

title: Run initial check functions — tz_all_checks
text: data frame initial check function results.

code: zoning_analysis_pipline(   bldg_file,   parcels_file,   ozfs_zoning_file,   detailed_check = FALSE,   run_check_land_use = TRUE,   run_check_height = TRUE,   run_check_height_eave = TRUE,   run_check_floors = TRUE,   run_check_unit_size = TRUE,   run_check_far = TRUE,   run_check_unit_density = TRUE,   run_check_lot_coverage = TRUE,   run_check_fl_area = TRUE,   run_check_unit_qty = TRUE,   run_check_footprint = FALSE )

title: Complete analysis to find where the building fits — zoning_analysis_pipline
text: bldg_file path json file representing building parcels_file path geojson file representing parcels ozfs_zoning_file path geojson file ozfs zoning codes. detailed_check TRUE, every parcel passes check matter result, take time. FALSE, subsequent checks skipped soon one check reads FALSE run_check_land_use analysis run check_land_use function? (logical) run_check_height analysis run check_height function? (logical) run_check_height_eave analysis run check_height_eave function? (logical) run_check_floors analysis run check_floors function? (logical) run_check_unit_size analysis run check_unit_size function? (logical) run_check_far analysis run check_far function? (logical) run_check_unit_density analysis run check_unit_density function? (logical) run_check_lot_coverage analysis run check_lot_coverage function? (logical) run_check_fl_area analysis run check_fl_area function? (logical) run_check_unit_qty analysis run check_unit_qty function? (logical) run_check_footprint analysis run check_footprint function? (logical)

title: Complete analysis to find where the building fits — zoning_analysis_pipline
text: simple features data frame centroid parcel column stating building allowance parcel column stating reason certain parcels allow building.
